    Facile Principal Components Analysis

    Steve Lianoglou

    5/17/2019

    FacileAnalysis-fpca.Rmd

    Under Construction

    • Performs PCA
    • Easily explore PCs
    • Extract the highly loaded genes (and genesets) from each PC

    Easy to run a PCA over the rnaseq data, or whatever other assy you got there (CNV, proteomics, take your pick)

    library(FacileData)
library(FacileAnalysis)
library(dplyr)

pca.crc <- exampleFacileDataSet() %>% 
  filter_samples(indication == "CRC") %>% 
  fpca(assay_name = "rnaseq")

    Vizualize the results:

    viz(pca.crc, pcs = 2, color_aes = "sample_type",
    hover = c("sex", "sample_type", "sample_id"))

    Need to fix up report()

    Not sure how to compare() two PCA results â€¦
